name: Merge Circus
description:
Merge small cute animals into bigger cute animals. Measure your skills by playing this puzzle game and achieving the highest score!

Merge Circus is an adorable physics-based puzzle game where you take the role of a small magician who's trying to fill his magical hat with cute animals. Can you help him achieve his goal of getting the biggest and cutest animal?

Features:

🐋 Merge two identical animals into a bigger animal. The bigger the animal the more space it takes up!

🧩 Strategize and use physics to your own advantage. Be creative and methodical while earning points and getting the highest score!

🗺️ The game is full of all kinds of animals from around the world. Land, sea, or air, they're all cute!

🎪 A cozy and comforting environment with nice gameplay that is engaging!
